title: Community, Location, Quality Living. It All Starts Here
posting_body: Welcome Home to Elevate at Red Rocks Apartment Homes
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1101 Sq.
Elevate at Red Rocks offers spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartments nestled in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains.
Only minutes away from downtown Denver, the community is in close proximity to numerous parks, shopping destinations, restaurants, and entertainment.
Residents can enjoy a dip in the pool, take a stroll with their dog around the community or take a short drive to enjoy the nearby countryside.
Whether it’s the fast pace of city life or a relaxing mountain atmosphere you’re looking for, Elevate at Red Rocks has something for everyone.
- Air Conditioner Balcony Ceiling Fan Heat Patio Washer/Dryer
- Business Center Clubhouse Fitness Center Night Patrol Pets Allowed Pool TV Lounge Online Payments Available
- Accepts Electronic Payments and Service Requests
Some breed restrictions ask for details
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
